title: [343. Integer Break](https://leetcode.cn/problems/integer-break/)

| English | 简体中文 |
343. Integer Break Description Given an integer n, break it into the sum of k positive integers, where k >= 2, and maximize the product of those integers.
Return the maximum product you can get.
 
Example 1:
Input: n = 2 Output: 1 Explanation: 2 = 1 + 1, 1 × 1 = 1. Example 2:
Input: n = 10 Output: 36 Explanation: 10 = 3 + 3 + 4, 3 × 3 × 4 = 36.  
Constraints:
2 <= n <= 58 Related Topics Math Dynamic Programming Similar Questions Maximize Number of Nice Divisors
